title: Sheepdog
creator_credit: British Sccreen Service and John Alderson
brief_description: The work of a typical English dog in the wild Welsh mountains. A study of a shepherd’s workmate, his sheepdog; used to protect flocks from marauding foxes, to round up stragglers, and to rescue injured lambs or sick ewes.
description: The work of a typical English dog in the wild Welsh mountains. A study of a shepherd’s workmate, his sheepdog; used to protect flocks from marauding foxes, to round up stragglers, and to rescue injured lambs or sick ewes.
